description:
*Latest update includes the 2012 Super Ads*

Super Ads is your #1 Big Game Ad viewer. Use Super Ads to look-up, share, & save your favorite Super Ads. As an American, the commercials that are shown while watching the Big Game are almost if not better than the actual game. Most people can remember the Super Ad from 3 years ago, but have no idea who won the game. 

Super Ads is a fully functional and feature filled Big Game Ad viewer. Features include:

- Super Ads from the last 4 Big Games. 2012, 2011, 2010, & 2009.
- Ability to search each Super Ad list by simply 'type to search' when viewing a list of Super Ads.
- Share your favorite Super Ads via Email, SMS, Facebook, Neato! and the following Twitter apps; Bad Kitty, Carbon, Quick Post, Spaz, Spaz Special Edition, Spaz Beta, Spaz HD for TouchPad, Tachyon, Twee, and Tweed.
- Configurable Share Menu (you choose your options)
- Mark the Super Ads you can't live without as a favorite and easily access them via the 'favorite toggle' button.
- Tap on the Super Ad thumbnail and the Super Ad plays automatically.

We can't stop watching our favorite Super Ads and we hope you enjoy it as much as we do. 

Please take a look at the video demo at http://AclassApps.com/apps/superads to see Super Ads in action.
